actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for the use of presently authorized double-sideband radio equipment until January 1, 1982.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Communications Commission to allow the use of presently authorized double-sideband radio equipment on ships licensed to carry such equipment until January 1, 1982.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the use of presently authorized double-sideband radio equipment until January 1, 1982.
